title: How to Straighten Plastic Knitting Needles

steps.headline: Fill a bowl with cold water.
Hold the knitting needles over the steam rising out of the boiling water.
steps.description: Alternatively, dip the needles into nearly boiling water.

steps.headline: Remove the needles from the steam or near boiling water.
Straighten the needles between your fingers.
Once straightened, plunge the needles into the bowl of cold water.

text: Fill a bowl with cold water.  Boil a saucepan of water.  Hold the knitting needles over the steam rising out of the boiling water. Alternatively, dip the needles into nearly boiling water. Remove the needles from the steam or near boiling water.  Straighten the needles between your fingers.  Once straightened, plunge the needles into the bowl of cold water. This will set the shape.
